Collision handler for the ball

return.description: The x and y coordinate of the middle of the ball.

classitems.name: Ball#getRadius

return.description: The radius of the ball.

classitems.description: Retrieves the color of the ball.
classitems.name: Ball#getColor

return.description: The color of the ball in hex value.

classitems.name: Ball#getBody

return.description: The body of the ball.

classitems.description: Updates the position of the body
classitems.name: Body#update

classitems.description:
Sets the velocity of the ball. 
It also calculates the corresponding speed values for the x and y axis.
classitems.name: Body#setVelocity

params.name: _vel
params.description: - The velocity of the ball.

classitems.description:
Sets the velocity direction (angle) of the ball. 
It also calculates the corresponding speed values for the x and y axis.
classitems.name: Body#setVelocityDirection

params.name: _direction
params.description: - The direction (angle) of the ball in radians.

classitems.description:
Sets the x and y speed values of the ball.
It also calculates the corresponding angle and velocity.
Note: The given speed can also be negative, it then moves in the opposite direction.
classitems.name: Body#setXYSpeed

params.name: _x
params.description: - The speed on the x axis (pixels per redraw).

params.name: _y
params.description: - The speed on the y axis (pixels per redraw).

classitems.description: Retrieves the x and y speed.
classitems.name: Body#getXYSpeed

return.description: The x and y speeds of the body.

classitems.description: Calculates the velocity direction (angle) in which the ball is moving, by using the current x and y speed of the ball.
classitems.name: Body#calculateVelocity

return.description: The angle in radians.

classitems.description: Calculates the velocity at which the ball is moving, by using the current x and y speed of the ball.
classitems.name: Body#calculateVDirection

return.description: The velocity of the ball.

classitems.description:
Reverts the y speed (positive to negative and vice versa).
It also calculates the new angle (speed remains the same).
classitems.name: Body#revertYSpeed

classitems.description:
Reverts the x speed (positive to negative and vice versa).
It also calculates the new angle (speed remains the same).
classitems.name: Body#revertXSpeed

classitems.description: Retrieves the position.
classitems.name: Body#getPosition

return.description: The x and y coordinate the position of the body.

classitems.description: Retrieves the velocity of the body.
classitems.name: Body#getVelocity

return.description: The current velocity of the body.

classitems.description: Retrieves the velocity direction (angle) of the body.
classitems.name: Body#getAngle

return.description: The current angle of the body in radians.

classitems.description:
Pole constructor
It automatically sets the pole to be immovable.

params.name: _radius
params.description: - The radius of the pole.

classitems.description:
Handles everything when the pole is hit:
from setting the hit flag, to managing the cooldown of the pole.
classitems.name: Pole#isHit

classitems.description:
Handles the cooldown period of the pole, which includes a change of color
and not being able to get hit again for some amount of time.
classitems.name: Pole#coolDown
